title: BRIEF-Acxiom Issued 45,176 Shares Of Common Stock In Aggregate To Holders Pursuant To Distribution Under Holdback Arrangement - SEC Filing​
text: Market News  30 PM / Updated 9 minutes ago BRIEF-Acxiom Issued 45,176 Shares Of Common Stock In Aggregate To Holders Pursuant To Distribution Under Holdback Arrangement - SEC Filing​ Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Feb 21 (Reuters) - Acxiom Corp: * ACXIOM-ON FEB 21, CO ISSUED 45,176 SHARES OF COMMON STOCK OF CO IN AGGREGATE TO HOLDERS PURSUANT TO DISTRIBUTION UNDER HOLDBACK ARRANGEMENT - SEC FILING​ Source text ( bit.ly/2EIyDYx ) Further company coverage:
